message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your willingness to sell, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1050000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $1025000.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $975000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $1050000.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $990000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $1075000.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $995000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value. If you're not willing to accept this offer, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
